original_title: DIMO joins hands with Construction, Power & Energy 2023 as Platinum Sponsor
original_body_lines: DIMO, a leading diversified conglomerate in Sri Lanka, has announced that it will be the platinum sponsor for the highly anticipated Construction, Power & Energy 2023.

The expo, organised by Lanka Exhibition and Conference Services Ltd. (LECS), is set to take place from 7 to 9 July at BMICH and will be the perfect platform for businesses to showcase their expertise and solutions in these vital sectors.

DIMO, operates in multiple sectors such as agriculture, building services, construction, healthcare, power, energy and water, industrial, education, home and garden, mobility, and digital, with the corporate purpose of fuelling the dreams and aspirations of the communities it serves. The Power, Energy and Construction sectors play a significant role in the economic development of the country and are essential to DIMO’s product portfolio, enabling the company to contribute to infrastructure development in Sri Lanka.

The company recognises the importance of upscaling the construction, power, and energy sectors and sees events such as expos and trade fairs as vital platforms to share knowledge and explore new market opportunities. Becoming the platinum sponsor of the Power, Energy & Construction Expo 2023 is a testament to DIMO’s commitment to supporting the growth of these sectors in Sri Lanka.

DIMO is geared to showcase its wide range of solutions in the power and energy, industrial, construction, and home and garden sectors, targeting both industrial players and end consumers. Visitors to the expo can look forward to attractive discounts on industrial solar solutions, DIMO LUMIN LED lighting products, and the premium Graphenstone decorative paint range from DIMO.
